title: Pitch Deck
text:
Who we are
        -
      
      We are an association of teachers dedicated to the teaching of statistical and machine learning techniques.
    
    
      
        Our mission
        -
      
      To support early-career astronomers in discovering analysis tools they may only know superficially or have previously attempted to learn but found difficult without additional guidance.
    
  
  
  In a few words, we allow students to grow:
  
  
    
  

  
    
      
        Our method
        -
      
      Leveraging years of experience, the field knowledge of our instructors, and a carefully orchestrated curriculum supported by refined lectures, we have created a robust and well-tested teaching experience - enter the AstroStatistics School!

title: The AstroStat Academy in a nutshell
text:
Are you an astronomer feeling your knowledge of Statistics is not enough?
    
    
  

  
    
      Are you familiar with Machine Learning but are looking to demystify this "black box"?
    
    
  



  
    You are in luck!
  
  The AstroStat Academy is here to help!


  The Academy
  Bravo
  Charlie
